website_summaries.verdict: Considering this is a mini refrigerator, it has a respectable amount of space; great for a college student's apartment or as a spare fridge.
pros: stands about 3.5 feet tall with a capacity of 4.3 cubic feet
Freezer is separate from refrigerator, unlike some other mini fridges
cons: This is a mini refrigerator/freezer, not a full-size appliance

customer_reviews.title: Great lil fridge
customer_reviews.text: I love this fridge, it is quite large and serves its purpose well, the fridge door originally came with a couple dents but I contacted the seller and they had a mew one at my doorstep within the following week. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great mini Frig
customer_reviews.text: Reefer arrived undamaged and for a mini frig has plenty of room for it's size. Very well packed
customer_reviews.author: James VonDeck

customer_reviews.title: Perfect office refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: Great small refrigerator -- does not take up a lot of space and looks nice
customer_reviews.author: Dr. B

customer_reviews.title: Small dent but great freezer
customer_reviews.text: There is a small dent on the front but not enough to send it back. The freezer gets cold enough for ice and popsicles. The fridge takes some time to cool if outside but it’s perfect for the canned drinks and mixers that are needed outside on the porch close to the pool deck.
customer_reviews.author: SeeBeach83

customer_reviews.title: I like this fridge/freezer combo
customer_reviews.text: This is a good fridge. It's a good size and has kept my food perfectly chilled. I prefer the separate freezer and fridge so this was perfect for me. Love it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Mejias

customer_reviews.title: Great price !
customer_reviews.text: This little fridge is 4 feet 2 inches I bought it for my daughter's room...also bought fridge stand so it is higher and she can put stuff in the drawers...magic chef has always been known for making great appliances
customer_reviews.author: Julie#2

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: It arrived dented and it to small. Very expensive for the size
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size..
customer_reviews.text: I Love it for it's Size and Looks! Perfect for one who does not need a Full Size one,, A+++
customer_reviews.author: Brent D Fulton

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected not much room.
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than Expected. I took it to my office and spent $500 at home deposit on a stainless steel GE fridge for my garage. Way too small to fit even a gallon of milk.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Harris

customer_reviews.title: Chronic failure of fan motor
customer_reviews.text: I am not the original purchaser of a new magic chef refrigerator but have acquired three separate units from the original owners. All three units had quit cooling and were offered cheap on Craigslist. Each unit had an identical failure of the evaporator fan motor and each was generally about three years old. The compressor will not run until the fan is running. The fan is easy to replace and is available for about $60.This is a good little refrigerator (when working) but one should opt for the extra warranty coverage or demand a couple of spar fan motors.
customer_reviews.author: J.R.T.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fridge!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this fridge! It's not too big, certainly not too small. We have a very small apartment but this is the perfect size. The freezer actually keeps things frozen unlike other mini/compact fridges I've had. There is some frost happening on the back wall of the fridge, but I have the setting set to the coldest it can be, 7. No complaints!!
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Truly is the 'big mini'
customer_reviews.text: Kind of disappointed when we took it out of the box and discovered the corner was broken and so was the crisper drawer. Otherwise, I think it's probably a really good refrigerator. Plenty of space to store things and the freezer is a decent size.
customer_reviews.author: Lite Wt.

product_meta.title: Magic Chef
product_meta.description: Whether you're college-bound or simply want a little extra refrigerator space in your home or office, the Magic Chef 2 Door, 4.3 cu. ft. Energy Star Compact Refrigerator has the storage options you're looking for. A can dispenser conveniently keeps soda in the door while additional door shelves provide space for other frequently used items. Glass refrigerator shelves keep foods organized and are easy to clean. The separate freezer compartment provides additional storage for frozen foods. ENERGY STAR qualified to meet or exceed federal guidelines for energy efficiency for year-round energy and money savings. 2 reversible doors offer multiple options for placement in a room. Adjustable screw legs to level on any type floor surface. THIS IS THE BIG MINI, WELL WORTH THE EXTRA MONEY VS THE 3 Cu Ft and smaller versions. Manufacturer only pads top and bottom of refrigerator and ONLY MAGIC MOUNTAIN WATER PRODUCTS (OVER PACKS) REPACKS THE REFRIGERATOR ON ALL SIX SIDES TO SURVIVE FEDEX AND UPS. OTHERWISE 30-70% DON'T MAKE IT WITHOUT DAMAGE. GET IT THERE THE FIRST TIME CHOOSE THE APPLIANCE PROFESSIONALS AT MAGIC MOUNTAIN WATER PRODUCTS, WELL WORTH THE MONEY. PLUS WATCH EXPECTED DELIVERY DATES, LONG TERM DELIVERY DATES INDICATE FOREIGN SELLERS.
feature_bullets: Interior light for easy viewing of stored items. The Manufacturer Magic Chef only pads 2 sides Magic Mountain Over Packs the Refrigerator on all 6 sides because without it 30-70% arrive damaged without it, buy it from the pro's and get it there the first time undamaged.
Door shelves/racks provide storage for larger items and smaller items to efficiently utilize interior capacity.
Upfront Interior analog controls for making quick adjustments to internal temperature.
3 fresh-food shelves and a crisper help keep foods organized.
In Door Can dispenser keeps beverage and soda cans neat and convenient.
